document_data.caption: A map showing the Gray Serpent (labeled #204) near Drakiir Street.
document_data.name: Gray Serpent
document_data.mainbody: The '''Gray Serpent''', which was also seen as the '''Grey Serpent''', was an [[inn]] located in [[Waterdeep]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: The inn stood three stories tall.
document_data.Location: The Gray Serpent was located in the central section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Trades Ward|Trades Ward]] on the eastern side of the [[Way of the Dragon (Waterdeep)|Way of the Dragon]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Dead Trades Ward}}
document_data.Rumors & Legends: A ''[[portal]]'' leading to [[Maldiglas's Refuge]] was found on the roof of the Gray Serpent on the outside wall at the head of the back stairway.
